@BeforeMethod is not executed, if a group is specified.

ional, either put that @BeforeMethod in the same group as the

 running or specify "alwaysRun=3Dtrue".

perienced it as not intuitive.

I expect a @BeforeMethod to run always othe=
rwise I would call it @BeforeMethodIfGroupMatches
